page.title: 05CAT HILL FOOT FARM.
page.content: This farm is to be found in the south west of the study area. All the 63 acres on this farm are rough grazing on which a variety of cows are kept,Ayrshire, British Friesian, Ayrshire Cross. These cows were used to produce milk.But now they are sold to abattoirs for beef. Also there were a dozen hens.Which layed around average of 8 eggs a day. {MACHINERY} Machinery consisted of: Muckspreader, Tractors,Tillers.These machines are only a few of which are on the farm. They kept a sheepdog to round up the sheep but now they have no sheep so they keep it as a pet.It is smaller than other farms so it doesn't produce as much as other farms.
